definition: a holder consisting of an arrangement of hooks on which keys or locks can be hung
details:
noun
- a holder consisting of an arrangement of hooks on which keys or locks can be hung
= example: a holder consisting of an arrangement of hooks on which keys or locks can be hung
- a device consisting of a set of keys on a piano, organ, typewriter, typesetting machine, computer or the like
= example: a device consisting of a set of keys on a piano, organ, typewriter, typesetting machine, computer or the like
